BRP Ramon Alcaraz undergoing repairs in India tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737583 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737583/brp-ramon-alcaraz-undergoing-repairs-in-india/story/ The BRP Ramon Alcaraz was moored and undergoing damage assessment and systems evaluation at the Port of Cochin in India after a fire broke out in its main engine room on Thursday, the Philippine Navy said Sunday. Sun, 10 May 2020 15:25:57 +0800
Cebu City records 40 new COVID-19 cases; total rises to 1,474 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737586 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/737586/cebu-city-records-40-new-covid-19-cases/story/ Cebu City has recorded 40 more cases of the coronavirus disease 2019, bringing the city s total infections to 1,474, its city health department announced Sunday. Sun, 10 May 2020 15:21:17 +0800
Barbers wants K-9 units deployed at checkpoints to curb drug smuggling tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737584 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737584/barbers-wants-k-9-units-deployed-at-checkpoints-to-curb-drug-smuggling/story/ Surigao Del Norte Representative Robert Ace Barbers on Sunday proposed that K-9 units be deployed at checkpoints along city and provincial borders to ensure that no illegal drugs will be smuggled into areas under lockdown. Sun, 10 May 2020 15:11:18 +0800
China donates more testing kits, PPEs to Philippines --DFA tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737582 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737582/china-donates-more-testing-kits-ppes-to-philippines-dfa/story/ China on Sunday donated at least 150,000 testing kits and 18,000 disposable overalls for medical frontliners in the Philippines amid the COVID-19 pandemic, according to the Department of Foreign Affairs. Sun, 10 May 2020 14:55:40 +0800
Sobrang daming isdang dilis dumagsa sa Parang, Sulu tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737580 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/737580/sobrang-daming-isdang-dilis-dumagsa-sa-parang-sulu/story/ Dalawang araw at dalawang gabi na umanong dumadagsa ang napakaraming isdang dilis sa baybayin ng Barangay Tandu Bunga sa bayan ng Parang sa lalawigan ng Sulu. Sun, 10 May 2020 14:28:49 +0800
Health worker na COVID-19 survivor sa Quezon, masayang sinalubong ng mga katrabaho tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737579 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/737579/health-worker-na-covid-19-survivor-sa-quezon-masayang-sinalubong-ng-mga-katrabaho/story/ Masayang sinalubong ng kanyang mga kasamahan sa trabaho nitong Sabado ang isang health worker sa Quezon nang ito ay makalabas ng pagamutan matapos gumaling sa COVID-19. Sun, 10 May 2020 13:53:57 +0800
Eleazar: Crime rate went down by 61% during ECQ; curfew should be part of new normal tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737575 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737575/eleazar-crime-rate-went-down-by-61-during-ecq-curfew-should-be-part-of-new-normal/story/ Joint Task Force COVID-19 Shield commander Police Lieutenant General Guillermo Eleazar on Sunday said the crime rate went down during the enhanced community quarantine, and added that curfew implementation should be included under the new normal in light of the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic. Sun, 10 May 2020 12:48:57 +0800
Sotto wants expanded nationwide mass testing for COVID-19 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737576 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737576/sotto-bats-for-expanded-nationwide-mass-testing-for-covid-19-disease/story/ Senate President Vicente Sotto III on Sunday pushed for expansion of the mass testing coverage for the COVID-19 disease, as Filipinos anticipate the relaxation of the enhanced community quarantine (ECQ) in select areas to general community quarantine (GCQ). Sun, 10 May 2020 12:45:38 +0800
DILG suggests raising qualifications for barangay official positions tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737573 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737573/dilg-suggests-raising-qualifications-for-barangay-official-positions/story/ Qualifications for positions of barangay officials need to be elevated as the national government is giving more tasks to them, the Department of the Interior and Local Government said Sunday. Sun, 10 May 2020 11:53:21 +0800
DILG backs proposal limiting barangay population to 15,000 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737571 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737571/dilg-backs-proposal-limiting-barangay-population-to-15-000/story/ A House bill seeking to limit the population of barangays to 15,000 gets the support of the Department of the Interior and Local Government, DILG Undersecretary Jonathan Malaya said Sunday. Sun, 10 May 2020 11:08:47 +0800
Barbers proposes limiting barangay population to 15,000 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737570 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737570/barbers-proposes-limiting-barangay-population-to-15-000/story/ Surigao Del Norte Representative Robert Ace Barbers has filed a measure limiting the population of every barangay to 15,000 in all urban areas of the country in a bid to speed up the delivery of services to residents. Sun, 10 May 2020 11:08:26 +0800
Mandaluyong's Barangay Mauway to be placed under total lockdown May 11-13 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737568 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/737568/mandaluyong-s-barangay-mauway-to-be-placed-under-total-lockdown-may-11-13/story/ Mandaluyong City announced that Barangay Mauway will be placed under total lockdown from May 11 to 13 as a response to the COVID-19 threat. Sun, 10 May 2020 10:39:33 +0800
Chinese tech to facilitate lab testing of coronavirus in Philippines tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737566 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737566/chinese-tech-to-facilitate-lab-testing-of-coronavirus-in-philippines/story/ Chinese novel coronavirus-testing technology will be applied in a laboratory at the Jose B. Lingad Memorial Regional Hospital in San Fernando Pampanga, Philippines, and is expected to improve the testing capacity of the country. Sun, 10 May 2020 10:19:56 +0800
Gatchalian wants to maximize use of television, radio in student learning amid COVID-19 crisis tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737565 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737565/gatchalian-wants-to-maximize-use-of-television-radio-in-student-learning-amid-covid-19-crisis/story/ Senator Sherwin Gatchalian on Sunday proposed to maximize the use of television and radio as learning resources of students under the so-called new normal environment in the wake of the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) health crisis. Sun, 10 May 2020 10:16:17 +0800
Batang babae sa Camarines Sur, pinatay at hininihalang ginahasa pa tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737564 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/737564/batang-babae-sa-camarines-sur-pinatay-at-hininihalang-ginahasa-pa/story/ Bangkay na at naaagnas na ang katawan ng isang siyam na taong gulang na batang babae nang matagpuan ito sa Barangay Mansalaya, Del Gallego, Camarines Sur nitong Sabado ng hapon.
